title: Manchester United 3-2 Bodo/Glimt: What Were The Main Talking Points As Ruben Amorim Gets His Maiden Old Trafford Victory?
description: While Manchester United might have gone about it the hard way on Thursday night, Ruben Amorim did claim a maiden victory in the Old Trafford dugout as his new squad snatched a 3-2 victory against Bodo/Glimt. Getting off to what was a dream start as Alejandro Garnacho tapped home in the opening seconds following Nikita […] The post Manchester United 3-2 Bodo/Glimt: What Were The Main Talking Points As Ruben Amorim Gets His Maiden Old Trafford Victory? appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Tom Dunstan

title: Maresca and Emery hail ´fantastic´ European displays ahead of Stamford Bridge clash
description: Enzo Maresca and Unai Emery both lauded “fantastic” European displays from Chelsea and Aston Villa respectively, ahead of their clash on Sunday. Villa visit Stamford Bridge on the back of a 0-0 draw with Juventus in the Champions League on Wednesday. Chelsea, meanwhile, defeated Heidenheim 2-0 on Thursday. And both bosses were delighted with what […] The post Maresca and Emery hail ´fantastic´ European displays ahead of Stamford Bridge clash appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
